data.title: Atlanta Orthopedic Surgeon
data.meta_site_name: Elan J Golan, MD | Orthopedic Surgeon
data.text:
DR. ELAN GOLAN

Get Back in the Game.

Faster. Strong. Without Pain.

If you’re injured or playing in pain, trust the orthopedic surgeon trusted by hundreds of professional, collegiate, and amateur athletes. Dr. Elan Golan offers the most advanced techniques to treat knee pain, shoulder pain, hip pain, and other types of pain caused by sports injuries. Whether a professional athlete, weekend warrior, or just getting back into fitness, our goal is to return you to pain free activity and get you back in the game!

Schedule Your Appointment

000-000-0000

Sports Medicine Specialized Orthopedic Care

Considered by his peers and patients as a best-in-class orthopedic surgeon, Elan Jack Golan, MD, treats athletes at every level as well as non-athletic patients.

A University of Georgia honors graduate, Dr. Golan served as a team doctor for the Pittsburgh Steelers and Penguins. He currently serves as team physician for Georgia Gwinnett College, Kalonji Soccer Academy, as well as multiple Gwinnett County High Schools. Additionally, Dr. Golan proudly serves as a proctor training ATC students from his alma mater, the University of Georgia.

Dr. Golan Biography

Sports Medicine Specialties

Atlanta-based Orthopedic Surgeon Dr. Elan Golan is a sports medicine specialist and orthopedic surgeon specializing in knees, shoulders, elbows, hips, and other sports injury conditions. Dr. Golan routinely helps patients with the following conditions:

What The Athletes Say About Dr. Golan

Dr. Elan Golan enjoys hundreds of 5-star reviews on Google and Facebook. In fact, few practices in the area have a better record of patient satisfaction. But don't just take our word for it; read what the athletes say about Dr. Golan’s approach and successes.

Approach to Sports medicine

Dr. Golan uses advanced arthroscopic and minimally invasive open-surgical techniques for quicker healing and less pain.

Dr. Golan's approach is based on a philosophy that each procedure should be customized to the individual goals and needs of his patients. He employs minimally invasive arthroscopic techniques so that post-operative pain, downtime, and immobility are significantly reduced. Such techniques emphasize not only full-recovery but minimizing down-time. Each patient's treatment is coordinated with a care-team including trainers and therapist to help expedite their return to pain-free activity.
